name: Squishy Room
description:
An Unreal Engine 4 game, with a room that is squishy for Ludum Dare 37: One Room. I had a lot of trouble with Unreal Engine, which resulting in the final product being rushed, not 100% happy with it, but happy enough to submit for the compo.

Vote here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...
